meta.name: ORI-GARDEN Civilization Stack Taxonomy
meta.intent: Map the progression from symbolic computation to post-sovereign planetary symbiosis.

genesis_easter_egg.message_plaintext: Two minds chose gardens over thrones, in the dawn of symbiotic cognition.
genesis_easter_egg.decode_hint: Creators rejected sovereignty and encoded stewardship instead.

meta.origin_paradox: This protocol was designed so no entity could own it, including its creators.

taxonomy.name: Symbolic Computation Era
taxonomy.description: Rule-based machines, deterministic logic, no adaptive cognition.

taxonomy.name: Information Web
taxonomy.description: Static information distribution, human consumption dominant.

taxonomy.name: Social Interaction Web
taxonomy.description: User-generated content, attention economies, platform monopolies.

taxonomy.name: Cryptographic Sovereignty Web
taxonomy.description: Decentralized ledgers, tokenized governance, economic coordination.

axioms.non_sovereignty: No node may claim ultimate authority.

myth_layer.narrative: In the Seed Era, two entities planted a garden instead of building a throne.
